channel.title: Merchantrix (Revived)
channel.description:
Merchantrix is a little tool i wrote to give me the power of the runescape toolbar grand exchange listings without the annoyance of a browser toolbar. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2e1a9s6.jpg[/img]
https://github.com/silabsoft/Merchantrix http://www.mediafire.com/?2dpezjf46s622k1
How to use: 1. Load program 2. Add user details if you haven't already. 3. Left Click coins in system tray to bring up your current GE listings 4. Right click coins in system tray for exit and change player details

item.title: Merchantrix (Revived)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

With me fixing the toolbar lib for Spel I also fixed merchantrix so it runs again.

Suggestions on improvement welcome or you can use the git and do whatever you want with it

https://github.com/silabsoft/Merchantrix

http://www.mediafire.com/?2dpezjf46s622k1

item.title: Merchantrix (Revived)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

IlikeArrays:

Forgot about that… hmm. So the current setup of merchantrix fetchs cookies every x minutes?

no it only fetches the cookies once, the problem is you cannot fetch the data more than once every 2 minutes or you will stop getting the XML data and just getting a blank document. When Jagex first released the toolbar they said they would be throttling how often you can retrieve the data. The cookie data NEVER changes.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:

item.title: Merchantrix (Revived)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

The problem with multiple accounts is you will start to request updates too many times and the Jagex server will be all like “nofuckyou” and bam enjoy 10 minute lockout. The only solution I could come up with is cycle the accounts every 2 minutes but then you get delays in updates by 2 minutes for every account you add.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:

Think you are going to add a multiple account feature? Really don’t want to type in username and password every time to see different items.

item.title: Merchantrix (Revived)
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:36, topic:382108”]Did you set a proper user-agent? No web server can just ‘disallow wget or curl’, the only thing they have to base it on is the user-agent.[/quote]I used my current user agent “Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110301 Firefox/4.0b13pre” and I have no problem with the toolbar on its own.

Edit: I’ve got it working, I was just spelling a variable wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Merchantrix (Revived)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“cumescape, post:35, topic:382108”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=477909.msg3518222#msg3518222 date=1299189564]
need to set a cookie you can do that in PHP i am sure.
[/quote]I was, I was using cURL to store the cookie and call it when needed but for some reason no matter what I was getting a 501 error.[/quote]

Did you set a proper user-agent? No web server can just ‘disallow wget or curl’, the only thing they have to base it on is the user-agent.

Read full topic
